snippet: The central bank would become chief regulator of all banks in the euro zone, but many details have not been worked out about how it would handle the job.
abstract: European Commission plan would make the European Central Bank chief regulator of all banks in the euro zone beginning in 2013, but many details have not been worked out about how it would handle the job.
lead_paragraph: The central bank would become chief regulator of all banks in the euro zone, but many details have not been worked out about how it would handle the job.

headline.main: European Central Bank May Get an Enforcement Role
headline.print_headline: European Central Bank May Get an Enforcement Role
